name: Trigeon
description:
In Trigeon, you control a three-man (a warrior, a mage, and an archer) dungeon group in their battle against a dungeon boss. Each party member has their own unique abilities - such as exchanging health for rage, summoning orbs to fight for you and poisoned arrows.

This game was made in ~24 hours for the Rising Jam #1.

This game requires Java 7 installed to run correctly.

A post-jam patch was released on the 25th June 2014.
